data.title: Raman Sreedharan, MBBS, DCH, MRCPCH
meta_keywords: gi doctors children's hospital of philadelphia
data.meta_description: Raman Sreedharan, MBBS, DCH, MRCPCH, is a pediatric gastroenterologist in the Division of Gastroenterology, Hepatology and Nutrition at Children's Hospital of Philadelphia.
data.text:
Books

2009

Gupta S, editor. Pediatric gastroenterology, hepatology and nutrition. Pitam Pura, Delhi, India: PeePee Publishers.

Chapters

2011

Sreedharan R, Liacouras C: Functional Abdominal Pain (Non organic Chronic Abdominal Pain). Nelson Text Book of Pediatrics, 19th Edition, Part XVIII, Chapter 334. Kliegman R, Behrman R, et al. (eds.). Elsevier, Page: 1346-1348, 2011.

Sreedharan R, Liacouras C: Major Symptoms and Signs of Digestive Tract Disorders. Nelson Text Book of Pediatrics 19th Edition, Part XVIII, Chapter 298. Kliegman R, Behrman R, et al. (eds.). Elsevier, Page: 1240-1248, 2011.

2008

Sreedharan R, Mehta DI: Pancreatitis. The 5-Minute Pediatric Consult, Fifth edition, Section I. Schwartz MW, Bell LM Jr, et al (eds.). Lippincott Williams & Wilkins, Page: 596-597, 2008.

Sreedharan R, Mehta DI: Pancreatic-pseudocyst. The 5-Minute Pediatric Consult, Fifth edition, Section I. Schwartz MW, Bell LM, et al. (eds.). Lippincott Williams & Wilkins, Page: 594-595, 2008.

2007

Sreedharan R, Tung J. Lactose intolerance. In: Liacouras C, Piccoli D, editors. Pediatric gastroenterology – the requisites. Philadelphia: Elsevier; 2007

2006

Kamath BM, Sreedharan R, Mamula P. Development and function: pancreas, bile duct, gallbladder. In: Ginsberg G, Ahmad N, editors. The clinician’s guide to pancreatiobiliary disorders. Thorofare: Slack Incorporated; 2006. p. 1-20.

2005

Mamula P, Sreedharan R, Brown AK. Gastrointestinal tract infections. In: Shah S, editor. Blueprints pediatric infectious diseases. Malden: Blackwell Publishing; 2005. p. 79-88.

Sreedharan R, Mehta DI. Pancreatitis. In: Schwartz MVV, Bell LM, Bingham PM, Chung EK, Friedman DF, Mulberg AE, Tanel RE, editors. The 5-minute pediatric consult, 4th ed. Philadelphia: Lippincott Williams & Wilkins; 2005. p. 610-11.

Sreedharan R, Mehta DI. Pancreatic-pseudocyst. . In: Schwartz MVV, Bell LM, Bingham PM, Chung EK, Friedman DF, Mulberg AE, Tanel RE, editors. The 5-minute pediatric Consult, 4th ed. Philadelphia: Lippincott Williams & Wilkins; 2005. p. 608-609.

Posters and Presentations

Invited Lectures

2023

Sreedharan R. Advances in Pediatric Gastroenterology. Al Qassimi Women's & Children's Hospital 3rd PICU conference & 2nd International Pediatric Conference, Sharjah, United Arab Emirates. Apr 2023.

Sreedharan R. Pancreatitis in Children. Lecture at Al Qassimi Women's and Children's Hospital, Sharjah, United Arab Emirates. Jan 2023.

Sreedharan R. Eosinophilic Esophagitis: update on diagnosis and management. Pediatric Grand Rounds at Al Qassimi Women's and Children's Hospital, Sharajah, United Arab Emirates. Jan 2023.

Sreedharan R. Pancreatitis in Children. Grand Rounds at Khorfakkan Hospital, Sharjah, United Arab Emirates. Jan 2023.
